```{r}
Wake_county <- read.csv("http://tiny.cc/dcf/street-addresses.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
Medicare <- readRDS("Providers.rds")
```

# pattern <- "ST|RD|ROAD"     this is saying find the pattern ST or RD or ROAD
# LeftOvers <-                this is saying create a new command called leftovers
#   Wake_county %>%           using Wake_county dataset
#   filter( ! grepl(pattern, address, ! grepl(" BOX ", address)))


```{r}
patterns <- "ST|RD|ROAD"
LeftOvers<-
  Wake_county %>%
  filter( ! grepl(patterns,address, ! grepl(" BOX ", address))) %>%
  head()
LeftOvers
```

```{r}
patterns <- "(ST|RD|ROAD|CIRCLE|WAY|PO BOX| BOX|TRAIL|LN|DR|CIR|AVE|HALL|CT|HOUSE|PLACE|WOODS|W|PL|BLVD|LANE|TR|PO BX|HIGHWAY|P.O.BOX|PO BO|VALLEY|COURT|TERRACE|COLLEGE|RUN|LOOP|HILL|BOX BO|ASU|LA|YALE|PATH|DORM|UNIVERSITY|RM|P O|C/O|TER|APARTMENT|HEIGHTS|POB|HOSPITAL|BOX|NCSU|COVE|CREEK|VINE|SUITE|ALLEY|BOLES|FERRY|MILL|PASS|ECU| SURFCONF|CALL|BAREFOOT|UNIT|RIDGE|CLUB|ACADEMY| OAKS| NEUSE|FAIRCLOTH| PO | APT | CO| PO |NC|US | SQUARE| PT| CV| OAK|  PO)"
LeftOvers2<-
  Wake_county %>%
  filter( ! grepl(patterns,address, ! grepl(" BOX ", address)))
LeftOvers2
head(dim(LeftOvers2))
```

```{r}
Streetcount <-
Wake_county %>%
  tidyr::extract(address, into = "street_word", regex = patterns, remove = FALSE) %>%
  group_by(street_word) %>%
  summarise(total=n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(total))
```
